data.text: She has prepared her meat and mixed her wine;
She has sent out her maidservants;
“Whoever is simple, let him turn in here!”
Leave your folly behind, and you will live;
He who corrects a mocker brings shame on himself;
Do not rebuke a mocker, or he will hate you;
Instruct a wise man, and he will be wiser still;
The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom,
For through wisdom 9:11 LXX, Syriac, and Aramaic Targum; Hebrew through me your days will be multiplied,
If you are wise, you are wise to your own advantage;
The woman named Folly is loud;
She sits at the door of her house,
calling out to those who pass by,
“Whoever is simple, let him turn in here!”
But they do not know that the dead 9:18 Hebrew the Rephaim are there,
